detaileddescription.para: Returns the legnth of the data array of the packet in multiples of 8 bytes.
Returns the legnth of the of the packet including its header in multiples of eight bytes.
Returns a crono_packet pointer pointing to the next packet in the ring buffer. Must be checked befor use to not point beyond the last packet in the buffer.

briefdescription.para: Data type used for boolean values in data structures.
